definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: India (Old Pers. Hiñd’ u Spieg:Altpers. Keilinschr. 246 Skr. Sindhu, sea, great river, v. reff. in Rö:Thes Add 83, Yule:Anglo-Indian Glossary, 329 ff.; cf. in Ar. hindun, Aram. henduw, etc.) only [[מֵהׂ֫דּוּ וְעַד־כּוּשׁ]] ([[הַמּׂלֵח]]) Es 1:1, Es 8:9 (LXX in both a)po\th=v )Indikh=v).
